items.sentence: When I heard that song, it reminded me of when I was a kid.
Mary has nobody to talk with, but she doesn\'t feel lonely.
I know you\'re not coming to my party, but I wish you were.
I looked up all the words I didn\'t know in the dictionary.
Tom was about to say something to Mary when his phone rang.
When Tom woke up, he found Mary reading a book at the desk.
Where have you been? We were just about to call the police.
Tom was the only one in the nightclub who wasn\'t drinking.
She cooks for him every day, but he doesn\'t appreciate it.
Tom is going to Mary\'s birthday party tomorrow, isn\'t he?
